title: Strengthening E-Learning Competencies: Language Education Simulation Development Through Virtual Learning World Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can build language education simulation spaces using virtual environment design tools (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine)
Learners can incorporate interactive elements suitable for target learners' (children/adolescents) language acquisition processes into virtual worlds
Learners can apply summative assessment tools to evaluate the effectiveness of VR-based language education activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
